CHAT.comment: WASHINGTON STATE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES, ET AL., Petitioners v. GUARDIANSHIP ESTATE OF DANNY KEFFELER, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CHRISTINE O. GREGOIRE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PATRICIA A. MILLETT ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF TERESA W. ROSEBOROUGH ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CHRISTINE O. GREGOIRE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:02 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
